name: lancel
bio: Entirely filled with a synthetic foam leftovers from chinese mattress manufacturers... and yet he lives on.

name: mike
bio: Enjoys sitting there and watching you.

name: frank
bio: Frank has personality issues, but is otherwise a good guy.

name: boss
bio: In the hood. Look out for boss as he could be anywhere...

name: frogger
bio: A time-traveling mutant straight from a bizarre, dystopian future. He's SO CUTE. You've never seen a kitten jump as high as frogger.

name: duckie
bio: A symbiotic being. Never take the duck away! You don't want to see Duckie when he's angry.

name: stretch
bio: This cat is able to stretch itself out to be quite long. May be part snake. Don't worry! He's not (very) venomous.

name: hubert
bio: Hubert doesn't have time for you. Hubert is contemplating deep and important things. Like string theory.
